publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5621 Ross Finnie: The Draft National Waste Management Plan for Scotland Regulations 2007—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft National Waste Management Plan for Scotland Regulations 2007 be approved. Supported by: Sarah Boyack*

S2M-5621 Ross Finnie: The Draft National Waste Management Plan for Scotland Regulations 2007—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft National Waste Management Plan for Scotland Regulations 2007 be approved. Supported by: Sarah Boyack
